extendedIngredients.name: caramels

recipes.title: Caramel Apple Crunch
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                Place the apples in a greased 13-in. x 9-in. baking dish. In a heavy saucepan, melt 25 caramels with 2 tablespoons milk, stirring often; drizzle over apples.                                                                                            In a large bowl, combine the flour, oats, brown sugar, walnuts, salt and cinnamon; cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Sprinkle over apples.                                                                                            Bake at 375° for 45-50 minutes or until golden brown. Cool for 10 minutes. Meanwhile, in a heavy saucepan, melt remaining caramels with remaining milk, stirring often until smooth. Drizzle over dessert and ice cream if desired.                                        Yield: 12-16 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Caramel Apple Crunch in  Taste of HomeOctober/November 2005, p29                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 serving (2/3 cup) equals 261 calories, 10 g fat (5 g saturated fat), 17 mg cholesterol, 133 mg sodium, 42 g carbohydrate, 2 g fiber, 3 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: Place the apples in a greased 13-in. x 9-in. baking dish. In a heavy saucepan, melt 25 caramels with 2 tablespoons milk, stirring often; drizzle over apples.
In a large bowl, combine the flour, oats, brown sugar, walnuts, salt and cinnamon; cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Sprinkle over apples.
Bake at 375° for 45-50 minutes or until golden brown. Cool for 10 minutes. Meanwhile, in a heavy saucepan, melt remaining caramels with remaining milk, stirring often until smooth.
Drizzle over dessert and ice cream if desired.
